mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, LOGO, COMPANY_CLASSIFICATION, AVG_SAL, HEADCOUNT, INPUT_DATE FROM COMPANYINFO ORDER BY company_name
SELECT COMPANY_CODE FROM COMPANYINFO WHERE ROWNUM=1 ORDER BY COMPANY_CODE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANYINFO(COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, LOGO, COMPANY_IMG, AVG_SAL, REVENUE, ESTABLISHMENT_DATE, HEADCOUNT, BUSINESS_NUMBER, ADDR, CEO_NAME, COMPANY_CLASSIFICATION, INPUT_DATE) VALUES(#{companyCode},#{companyName},#{description},#{logo},#{companyImg},#{avgSal},#{revenue},TO_DATE(#{establishmentDate}, 'YYYY'),#{headcount},#{businessNumber},#{addr},#{ceoName},#{companyClassification},SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPANYINFO SET COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName}, BUSINESS_NUMBER=#{businessNumber}, HEADCOUNT=#{headcount}, ESTABLISHMENT_DATE=#{establishmentDate}, REVENUE=#{revenue}, ADDR=#{addr}, CEO_NAME=#{ceoName}, AVG_SAL=#{avgSal}, COMPANY_CLASSIFICATION=#{companyClassification}, DESCRIPTION=#{description}, LOGO=#{logo}, COMPANY_IMG=#{companyImg} WHERE COMPANY_CODE=#{ companyCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HISTORY WHERE COMPANY_CODE=#{companyCode} AND BASE_DATE=#{baseDate}
DELETE FROM WELFARE WHERE COMPANY_CODE=#{companyCode} AND CATEGORY=#{category}
